tweet_text: @SwimmersJackson A3 might equate to potatoes, A2 might be meat, A1 pizza etc so you select the “A” that you want. Turn the dial which represents weight 250g, 300g etc and hit start. That will automatically work out the time. And Away you go.
text_en: A3 might equate to potatoes, A2 might be meat, A1 pizza etc so you select the A that you want. Turn the dial which represents weight g, g etc and hit start. That will automatically work out the time. And Away you go.

tweet_text:
@altonbrown @FedEx Years ago I had an issue with my cable co. I was literally on line for 7 hours. Luckily I was off for the day & a speaker phone. 
I wrote a handwritten letter. I got 6 months of free cable plus premium channels. They called to apologize.
